summary: P71 Quick Promote Buttons - All features verified. Individual Listing Applications shows quick promote section for free/paid listings with 'Gün' input + 'Vitrine Ata' + 'Acile Ata' buttons. Corporate page loads correctly (no pending listings). Invalid day validation working.
critical_code_review_comments: Quick promote section renders only when applicationsMode=true AND listing.doping_type is 'free' or 'paid'
Days input has default value '7' and min=1, max=365 validation
applyQuickPromote calls POST /api/admin/listings/{id}/doping with doping_type and duration_days
Invalid day values (0, empty, negative) show alert 'Manuel gün sayısı 1 veya daha büyük olmalı'
After promotion to showcase/urgent, quick promote section is hidden (listing no longer free/paid)
data-testid attributes properly set: listing-doping-promote-days-{id}, listing-doping-promote-showcase-{id}, listing-doping-promote-urgent-{id}
seed_data_creation: Tested with existing pending_moderation listings. Two listings promoted: 1 to Vitrin, 1 to Acil
context_for_next_testing_agent: P71 Quick Promote buttons fully operational on Individual Listing Applications page. Corporate page loads but had no pending listings to test with. Quick promote section shows for free/paid doping_type listings in applicationsMode. Validation prevents invalid days (0/empty). Both 'Vitrine Ata' and 'Acile Ata' buttons work correctly, calling doping endpoint and updating listing status.

individual_listings_quick_promote_sectio.description: Quick promote section visible for free/paid listings in applicationsMode

days_input.description: Days input with default value '7', accepts 1-365

vitrine_ata_button.description: 'Vitrine Ata' button promotes listing to showcase type

acile_ata_button.description: 'Acile Ata' button promotes listing to urgent type

invalid_day_validation.description: Shows alert for empty/0 day values

quick_promote_hidden_after_promotion.description: Section hidden after listing promoted to showcase/urgent

corporate_listings_page.description: Page loads correctly, shows empty state (no pending corporate listings)

doping_counts_update.description: Tab counts update correctly after promotion
